r.d: The Log package provides an abstracted logging framework. It includes output handlers for log files, databases, syslog, email, Firebug, and the console. It also provides composite and subject-observer logging mechanisms.
r.n: - The 'firebug' handler is now usable with Chrome, as well. (Request 18617) - The 'observer' code now longer generates deprecated return value reference notices. (Bug 18830)
